name: butter caramels
description:
Slow-cooked in small batches, the taste of our caramels can’t be beat. With a texture that’s silky smooth and just a little chewy, our classic butter caramel tastes of butter and brown sugar, with a hint of vanilla. A dessert unto themselves, each piece is generously cut to weigh almost one ounce, then carefully wrapped in wax paper.

Best if eaten within eight weeks of delivery.

Ingredients: cream, brown cane sugar, organic agave nectar, organic butter, sea salt, and organic vanilla extract. Made in a facility which processes tree nuts and peanuts. GLUTEN-FREE and SOY-FREE.

name: chocolate caramels
description:
Slow-cooked small batches, the taste of our caramels can’t be beat. With a texture that’s silky smooth and just a little chewy, our chocolate caramel combines intense chocolate flavor with the smooth and slightly chewy texture of caramel. A dessert unto themselves, each piece is generously cut to weigh almost one ounce, then carefully wrapped in wax paper.

Best if eaten within eight weeks of delivery.

Ingredients: cream, brown cane sugar, organic agave nectar, dark chocolate (cacao beans, pure cane sugar, cocoa butter, soya lecithin, vanilla beans), organic butter, sea salt, and organic vanilla extract. Made in a facility which processes tree nuts and peanuts. GLUTEN-FREE.

name: cinnamon caramels
description:
Slow-cooked in small batches, the taste of our caramels can’t be beat. With a texture that’s silky smooth and just a little chewy, our cinnamon caramel will bring to mind the gooey center of a cinnamon roll. A dessert unto themselves, each piece is generously cut to weigh almost one ounce, then carefully wrapped in wax paper.

Best if eaten within eight weeks of delivery.

Ingredients: cream, brown cane sugar, organic agave nectar, organic butter, sea salt, organic vanilla extract, and organic Ceylon cinnamon. Made in a facility which processes tree nuts and peanuts. GLUTEN-FREE and SOY-FREE.

name: sea salt caramels
description:
Slow-cooked in small batches, the taste of our caramels can’t be beat. With a texture that’s silky smooth and just a little chewy, our sea salt caramel adds a healthy dose of salt to complement the flavors of butter, brown sugar, and vanilla. A dessert unto themselves, each piece is generously cut to weigh almost one ounce, then carefully wrapped in wax paper.

Best if eaten within eight weeks of delivery.

Ingredients: cream, brown cane sugar, organic agave nectar, organic butter, sea salt, and organic vanilla extract. Made in a facility which processes tree nuts and peanuts. GLUTEN-FREE and SOY-FREE.

name: chocolate chocolate caramels with cocoa nibs
description:
The ultimate chocolate trifecta: dark chocolate caramel dipped in 61% dark chocolate, then doused in crunchy cocoa nibs.

Ingredients: cream, brown cane sugar, dark chocolate (cacao beans, pure cane sugar, cocoa butter, soya lecithin, vanilla beans), organic agave nectar, organic butter, salt, organic vanilla extract, cocoa nibs. Made on equipment which also processes tree nuts and peanuts. GLUTEN-FREE.

name: chocolate chocolate caramels with Fleur de Sel
description:
Dark chocolate caramel dipped in 61% chocolate, sprinkled with delicate flakes of French Fleur de Sel salt. 

Ingredients: cream, brown cane sugar, dark chocolate (cacao beans, pure cane sugar, cocoa butter, soya lecithin, vanilla beans), organic agave nectar, organic butter, salt, organic vanilla extract. Made on equipment which also processes tree nuts and peanuts. GLUTEN-FREE.

name: chocolate chocolate caramels
description:
Deep, dark chocolate caramel, dipped in 61% dark chocolate. 

Ingredients: cream, brown cane sugar, dark chocolate (cacao beans, pure cane sugar, cocoa butter, soya lecithin, vanilla beans), organic agave nectar, organic butter, salt, organic vanilla extract. Made on equipment which also processes tree nuts and peanuts. GLUTEN-FREE.

name: chocolate covered butter caramels
description:
Classic butter caramel dipped in 51% chocolate. (Somewhere in between milk and dark, this blend is a perfect complement to our caramel.)

Ingredients: cream, brown cane sugar, organic agave nectar, dark chocolate (cacao beans, pure cane sugar, cocoa butter, soya lecithin, vanilla beans), milk chocolate (pure can sugar, full cream milk, cocoa butter, cacao beans, soya lecithin, vanilla beans), organic butter, salt, organic vanilla extract. Made on equipment which also processes tree nuts and peanuts. GLUTEN-FREE.

name: butter caramels with Fleur de Sel
description:
Our rich butter caramel dipped in a blended 51% chocolate, sprinkled with delicate flakes of French Fleur de Sel salt. 

Ingredients: cream, brown cane sugar, organic agave nectar, dark chocolate (cacao beans, pure cane sugar, cocoa butter, soya lecithin, vanilla beans), milk chocolate (pure can sugar, full cream milk, cocoa butter, cacao beans, soya lecithin, vanilla beans), organic butter, salt, organic vanilla extract. Made on equipment which also processes tree nuts and peanuts. GLUTEN-FREE.
